name: Hentai Shooter 3D: Christmas Party
description:
At New Year holidays, Seranul like all lonely loser, spend his time, staring at blink monitor of his old PC.
Nourishing dinner, a pair of favorite games and many jars of good beer, is all he had.
Instead of happy Christmas parties, about which he dreamed on.
But now, all will change!
Seranul will meet uninvited guests.
Young beauties from the parallel universe will suddenly appear into his home.
And so, the thrilling Christmas begin!
Help Seranul stop the invasion and show the alien girls who's boss!

Game features:
• Retro graphics.
• Oldschool gameplay.
• Christmas spirit and the atmosphere of the New Year holidays.
• A bunch of alien beauties who will not let you get bored.
• The game has no words, only action.
• Christmas and New Year's music
• 5 Levels with a Christmas theme.
